data.title: Tapulous news and history
data.meta_description: Read all about the history of Tapulous, a mobile game development company founded by Bart Decrem and Andrew Lacy, and acquired by Disney, on TechCrunch.
data.text:

Back in July 2008, Tapulous released a music game for the iPhone called Tap Tap Revenge (TTR). The game proved to be a massive hit, growing to 1 million users…
